examples.example: 我今天去医院看望生病的朋友，那里的医生和护士都很热情和专业。

translate.english: I went to the hospital to visit my sick friend today, and the doctors and nurses there are all very enthusiastic and professional.

examples.example: 我每次经过医院，都会想到那些白衣天使们为了人们的健康而辛勤付出。

translate.english: Every time I pass by the hospital, I will think of those angels in white who work hard for people's health.

examples.example: 在医院的每一个角落，都能感受到温暖和关爱。

translate.english: In every corner of the hospital, one can feel warmth and care.
